reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Rifinanziamento Fondo Bilaterale Emergenza presso OIM /IOM per l'anno 2016

description.narrative: Contributo volontario per il rifinanziamento del Fondo Bilaterale Emergenza in essere presso l'OIM/IOM per il finanziamento di interventi umanitari in risposta a calamità naturali o causate all'uomo.

Voluntary contribution to IOM-Italy Bilateral Emergency Fund to support humanitarian interventions related to unforseeable emergencies caused by both man-made and natural disasters and to any event in which there is a clear threat to the survival of human life
